name: Ext_R4_ServiceRequest_reasonReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ServiceRequest.reasonReference for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.reasonReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this service is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
